name: getpeoplebytopic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dei.
Tool description: The Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) API offers the learning resources, conferences, stories and other information.
API description: Fetches Azure influencers by topic from the specified page using the RapidAPI key.

topic.description: The topic to search for Azure influencers.

page.description: The page number of search results to retrieve.
